name: Prashant Khanduri
content: Prashant Khanduri - James and Patricia Anderson College of Engineering - Wayne State University Prashant Khanduri Assistant Professor, Computer Science Contact khanduri.prashant@wayne.edu 5057 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202 Homepage URL Google Scholar URL Curriculum Vitae Prashant Khanduri Assistant Professor, Computer Science Biography Prashant Khanduri is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Wayne State University, MI. Previously, he was a Postdoctoral Associate jointly hosted by the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at University of Minnesota, MN, and the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at The Ohio State University, OH. He received Ph.D. from the Department of Electrical Engineering & Computer Science at Syracuse University, NY. His research interests include Optimization for Machine Learning, Federated Learning, Robust Optimization, Statistical Learning, and Statistical Signal Processing. Education Ph.D., Syracuse University, NY Research interests Optimization for Machine Learning, Federated Learning, Robust Optimization, Statistical Learning, and Statistical Signal Processing.
